name: Bit Maps
description: Kyle needs to mow his 4800x4800 lawn, but his property only contains areas accessible by moving in the four cardinal directions from the top left corner. Here's the {{url_for("map.dat", display="map")}} of the area. 0's are blocks that must be mowed, while 1's are impassible. How many blocks of grass must Kyle mow?
hints: What happens when it rains a lot?
Read this as a computer would
author: Michael
